column5: I can't seem to find them anywhere, am I just missing them? I am looking for the white/cream color ones. Last time I bought them was in Orilla right before the swing bridge, I cant remember the shop name.  Can anyone help me out? Does JB's carry them? Anyone in the Ottawa region?

They aren't berkley but they're 6 inch grubs...  http://www.cabelas.com/product/Kalins-634-Mogambo-Grub/743873.uts?Ntk=AllProducts&searchPath=%2Fcatalog%2Fsearch.cmd%3Fform_state%3DsearchForm%26N%3D0%26fsch%3Dtrue%26Ntk%3DAllProducts%26Ntt%3DGrub%26x%3D0%26y%3D0%26WTz_l%3DHeader%253BSearch-All%2BProducts&Ntt=Grub&WTz_l=Header%3BSearch-All+Products
Mike, I remember seeing a bunch of these at Gagnons in Oshawa a little while ago.  Give them a shout.

http://www.berkley-fishing.com/products/soft-bait/gulp/grub-gulp  Model No. Amount Weight Color Size Price GSG6-CH (1130758)  4 n/a Chartreuse 6 inches $6.99 GSG6-NP (1130760)  4 n/a New Penny 6 inches $6.99 GSG6-NCH (1130761)  4 n/a Nuclear Chicken (Glow) 6 inches $6.99 GSG6-PSH (1130763)  4 n/a Pink Shine (Glow) 6 inches $6.99 GSG6-WH (1130762)  4 n/a White 6 inches $6.99 GSG6-WG (1130766)  4 n/a White Glow 6 inches $6.99
Want to be Muskie angler using 6" power grubs.
I have never caught a musky and I heard these are great for them...  To the rest...  Thanks all, I will check all these places.
I remember seeing them at Tightlines in Pickering as well.
